title: BRIEF-Saudi Aramco Assures India's Reliance Oct Supplies Will Be Maintained -Reliance
text:
BRIEF-Saudi Aramco Assures India's Reliance Oct Supplies Will Be Maintained -Reliance

Commodities 11 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 16:50)

BRIEF-Saudi Aramco Assures India's Reliance Oct Supplies Will Be Maintained -Reliance Sept 30 (Reuters) - Reliance Industries Ltd : * IN IMMEDIATE AFTERMATH OF SAUDI DRONE STRIKE, SAUDI ARAMCO MAINTAINED SUPPLY WITH ALTERNATE GRADES OF CRUDE OIL * ARAMCO REASSURED THAT SUPPLIES FOR OCTOBER WILL BE MAINTAINED BOTH IN TERMS OF QUANTITY AND MIX OF GRADES

BRIEF-Saudi Aramco Assures India's Reliance Oct Supplies Will Be Maintained -Reliance
description: BRIEF-Saudi Aramco Assures India's Reliance Oct Supplies Will Be Maintained -Reliance
